product_name: Patagonia Reversible Baby Sun Bucket Hat - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The Patagonia Reversible Baby Sun bucket hat for little girls can be worn with the print showing or the solid color showing. Either way, it has a wide brim to protect young skin from the sun. Supplex(R) nylon fabric with a water-repellent finish is lightweight, dries fast and packs down small. Floppy construction wears comfortably and looks darn cute. Expanded brim shields head and neck. The Patagonia Reversible Baby Sun bucket hat features a chin strap with rip-and-stick fastener that secures the hat on child's head and can be tucked away when not in use.
short_description: The Patagonia Reversible Baby Sun bucket hat for little girls can be worn with the print showing or the solid color showing. Either way, it has a wide brim to protect young skin from the sun.
